attributes.action: Stop the rise in cost on food shopping
attributes.additional_details: Stop the rise in cost on food shopping, the rise in costs to do a weekly shop are rising to a point that should not be acceptable. The countries nutrition is being put at stake with the costs rising and money dropping the majority of the public are forced to eat lower standard food to keep costs low, especially the nutrition for children who need this to sustain growth and development. Drop costs on food, we need to eat to survive. Especially on fresh fruit and vegetables!
